images.source_content: Image of Oppenheimer working in his lab
Image of Oppenheimer discussing the movie script
Image of the movie set with actors portraying Oppenheimer's life

script.text: The story of how the Oppenheimer movie was made starts with Oppenheimer in his lab, deeply engrossed in his work.
As the movie concept evolved, Oppenheimer actively participated in discussions about the script, ensuring its accuracy.
The movie set came to life with actors portraying key moments from Oppenheimer's life, capturing the essence of his journey.
